When I first played cs:go I thought it was fun. WAS, after a couple of days I noticed that the weapons weren't even strong. When I play other game modes and i start shooting the enemy in the face 10 times. they dont die. even with the shotguns. even a shotgun could do a one shot one kill. But nooooo. NOOOOOO. THEY HAVE TO MAKE SO YOU HAVE TO SHOOT THEM ONE MILLION TIMES IN THE FACE. WHEN I PLAYED FLYING SCOUTSMAN. I GOT KICKED OUT OF THE FIRST SERVER IMMEDIATELY FOR NO REASON AT ALL! AND THE SECOND SERVER THERE WAS A HACKER. DO SOMETHING ABOUT THAT. AND THE AIM. I KNOW IT IS AN OLD GAME. BUT I THINK THAT IS THE REASON WHY I DIE A LOT IS ECAUSE THERE IS NO AIM. THERE SHOULD BE AN AIM OPTION. Anyways it is a 3/10-6/10. anyways please fix the problems
10/10 would recommand if you have friends to play with
